Article/0-0-0-18/context-environment.title: Context Environment
Article/0-0-0-18/context-environment.html:
• Type: object<\/code><\/li>
  • Origin: Nullstack Context<\/a><\/li>
  • Availability: server/client<\/li>
  • readonly<\/strong> in server/client context<\/li> <\/ul>

    It gives you information about the current environment.<\/p>

    The following keys are available in the object:<\/p>

    • client<\/strong>: boolean<\/code><\/li>
    • server<\/strong>: boolean<\/code><\/li>
    • development<\/strong>: boolean<\/code><\/li>
    • production<\/strong>: boolean<\/code><\/li>
    • static<\/strong>: boolean<\/code><\/li>
    • key<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • hot<\/strong> boolean<\/code><\/li> <\/ul> 
      import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Page<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>
 
  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>environment}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span> 
        {<\/span>environment.<\/span>client &&<\/span> <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>I<\/span>'m in<\/span> the client</<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        {<\/span>environment.<\/span>server &&<\/span> <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>I<\/span>'m in<\/span> the server</<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        {<\/span>environment.<\/span>development &&<\/span> <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>I<\/span>'m in<\/span> development mode</<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        {<\/span>environment.<\/span>production &&<\/span> <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>I<\/span>'m in<\/span> production mode</<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        {<\/span>environment.<\/span>static &&<\/span> <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>I<\/span>'m in<\/span> a static<\/span> site</<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span> My key is {<\/span>environment.<\/span>key}<\/span></<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Page;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

      The environment hot<\/em> is boolean that identifies if hot reload is enabled and is available only in development mode.<\/p>

      Custom Events<\/a><\/h2>
      During development any updates to tracked files will raise a custom event you can use to facilitate development flow.<\/p>

      You can use this event to improve the developer experience by creating custom side effects to changes, like reinitiating specific components that need to reload data when code changes.<\/p>

      import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> BlogArticle<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  hydrate<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>environment}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    if<\/span>(<\/span>!<\/span>environment.<\/span>hot)<\/span> return<\/span>
    window.<\/span>addEventListener<\/span>(<\/span>environment.<\/span>event,<\/span> (<\/span>)<\/span> =><\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>initiate<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> BlogArticle;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

      

      ðŸ”¥ environment.event<\/code> is only available in client functions/lifecycles.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

      The environment key<\/em> is an md5 hash of the current environment folder outputs. The key is appended to assets<\/a> and static API<\/a> path to assist cache control.<\/p>
Article/0-0-0-18/context-environment.description: The environment object is a proxy in the Nullstack Context available in both client and server and gives you information about the current environment
